title: Transformative Pedagogy Design for Smart Society Civic Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Knowledge and Experience in Applying Technical Skills
context.additional_context: Simulation-based educational course for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to develop civic competencies in smart societal environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze collaboration mechanisms between Civic Tech and GovTech through smart city simulations.
Learners can propose solutions to social problems by applying double-loop learning and design thinking methodologies.
Learners can execute digital citizen collaboration projects in constrained technological environments based on Agile and Lean principles.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
